abstract: Driven column review of the Honda Accord Hybrid.
lead_paragraph: The Accord has the appearance of gas-only models, but inside is a lithium-ion battery and a gas-electric system that is unlike other hybrids.

headline.main: Video Review: Honda Takes Different Path With the Accord Hybrid
headline.print_headline: Honda Takes a Different Path With the Accord Hybrid

snippet: The Accord has the appearance of gas-only models, but inside is a lithium-ion battery and a gas-electric system that is unlike other hybrids.
